column3: During fiscal 2011, the Company changed its method of accounting for the classification of interest and penalties related to uncertain tax positions to include such amounts as a component of the Provision for income taxes. They had previously been classified within Interest income, net. Previously reported amounts for fiscal years 2010 and 2009 have been restated to reflect this change. See the Change in Accounting Principle note presented in the Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements.
